comments.value: # Functionality : As a tester, I want to be see the Frequently Asked Question page of the GetoPay app so that i am able to see FAQ details

steps.name: I'm on Getgo landing page

elements.name: As a tester, I want to be see the Frequently Asked Question page of the GetoPay app so that i am able to see FAQ details

steps.name: I'm login into my "Peso" account with my "Peso_Username" and "Peso_Password"
I choose More menu options from the GetGopay dashboard page
More page should be displayed with the options "About the Cards", "Contact Us","Frequently Asked Questions" & "Terms & Conditions"
I click on "Frequently Asked Questions" option

Frequently Asked Questions page should be displayed with three frequently asked questions "What's the main difference of the GetGo Virtual Prepaid vs GetGo Peso+ Card? What is best for me?","What are the requirements to get the GetGo Virtual Prepaid?" & "How much is the GetGo Virtual Prepaid?"

arguments.val: What's the main difference of the GetGo Virtual Prepaid vs GetGo Peso+ Card? What is best for me?
What are the requirements to get the GetGo Virtual Prepaid?
How much is the GetGo Virtual Prepaid?

comments.value: # Functionality : As a tester, I want to be able to login using my credentials so that I can see my card details.

steps.name: I'm on Getgo landing page

elements.name: As a tester, I want to be able to login using my credentials so that I can see my account(Virtual Card or Peso+) details

steps.name: I'm on Getgo login page
I enter a "Virtual_Username" & click next
I enter password "Virtual_Password"
I click login
I should see my "Virtual" account dashboard with my profile picture & my full name
I'm on Getgo landing page

elements.name: As a tester, I want to be able to login using my credentials so that I can see my account(Virtual Card or Peso+) details

steps.name: I'm on Getgo login page
I enter a "Peso_Username" & click next
I enter password "Peso_Password"
I click login
I should see my "Peso" account dashboard with my profile picture & my full name
I'm on Getgo landing page
I'm on Getgo login page
I enter a "Invalid_Email" & click next
System should through an invalid email error message
I'm on Getgo landing page
I'm on Getgo login page with "Valid_Email"
I enter a "Invalid_Password" and click next
System should through an invalid password message
I'm on Getgo landing page
I'm on Getgo login page
I enter a blank spaces in email field
System should through an email error message as "Invalid email format"
I'm on Getgo landing page
I'm on Getgo login page with "Valid_Email"
I enter a blank spaces in password field and click next
System should through an invalid password message
I'm on Getgo landing page
I'm on Getgo login page
I enter a numerical values in email field
System should through an email error message as "Invalid email format"

comments.value: # Functionality : As a tester, I want to launch the GetGo Pay application freshly so that I am able to see the product welcome feature details

elements.name: As a tester, I want to launch the GetGo Pay application freshly so that I am able to see the product welcome feature details

steps.name: I'm on Getgo application with welcome page one content details,greeting image & next button
I click on next button
welcome page two should be displayed with contents,greeting image & next button
I click on next button
welcome page three should be displayed with contents,greeting image & next button
I click on next button
welcome page four should be displayed with contents,greeting image & next button
I click on next button
welcome page five should be displayed with contents,greeting image & get Started button
I click on Get Started button
GetGo pay login/signup page should be displayed

comments.value: # Functionality : As a tester, I want to be see the Terms and Conditions page of the GetoPay app so that i am aware about the TERMS & CONDITIONS and PRIVACY POLICY details

steps.name: I'm on Getgo landing page

elements.name: As a tester, I want to be see the Terms and Conditions page of the GetoPay app so that i am aware about the TERMS & CONDITIONS and PRIVACY POLICY details

steps.name: I'm login into my "Peso" account with my "Peso_Username" and "Peso_Password"
I choose More menu options from the GetGopay dashboard page
More page should be displayed with the options "About the Cards", "Contact Us","Frequently Asked Questions" & "Terms & Conditions"
I click on "Terms and Conditions" option
Terms & Conditions page should be displayed with two sections "TERMS & CONDITIONS" and "PRIVACY POLICY" & verify the contents

comments.value: # Functionality : As a User, I want to view the transaction history details of my account in the GetGopay so that i am aware of my transaction details

steps.name: I'm on Getgo landing page

elements.name: As a User, I want to view the transaction history details of my account in the GetGopay so that i am aware of my transaction details - Activities from Dashboard page

steps.name: I'm on "Dashboard" page of GetGo pay with valid "Peso_Username" and "Peso_Password"
I click on the Availabel Balance Amount field in the Dasboard page
Transaction History/Activities for the logged user should be displayed
I verify all the details present in the Transaction History/Activities page
Click any one transaction list
I should see the Transaction History/Activities details page with Reference No,Transaction Date,Description,Transaction Amount & Ending Balance
I'm on Getgo landing page

elements.name: As a User, I want to view the transaction history details of my account in the GetGopay so that i am aware of my transaction details - Activities from Fund Transfer page

steps.name: I'm on "Send Money" page of GetGo pay with valid "Peso_Username" and "Peso_Password" details
I click on the Activities option from the bottom of the fund transfer page
Transaction History/Activities for the logged user should be displayed
I verify all the details present in the Transaction History/Activities page
Click any one transaction list
I should see the Transaction History/Activities details page with Reference No,Transaction Date,Description,Transaction Amount and Ending Balance

steps.name: I'm on Getgo virtual card registration screen
I enter Mobile Number, Email Address, and Nominate and Confirm password
I enter one time password
I fill my personal details
I review & submit
I click verify now
I should see the dashboard
I click the verification email link from my inbox

I login with the My Email next time
I should see my virtual card in the dashboard
